article.content:
![](/src/galaxy-team/ostrovsky.jpg)

Alex Ostrovsky

I began working with the Galaxy team in April 2019 with James Taylor's Lab at John's Hopkins. As I work with Galaxy, I am also completing my master's degree in Bioinformatics at the University of Oregon. My work with Galaxy involves wrapping and developing of tools, especially in the area of single-cell sequencing.

Before Galaxy, I worked as a Research Assistant in the Remington lab, the Postlethwait lab, and the Smear lab at the University of Oregon.

Contact

Email aostrov4@jhu.edu
